DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : TECHNOLOGY
DOC.TEXT: Microsoft Buying Maker of Animation Software : In a move underscoring its commitment to digital multimedia , Microsoft Corp said it has agreed to acquire Montreal-based Softimage Inc , a developer of computer animation software , in a $ 130-million stock deal . The acquisition , the software giant ' s second biggest ever , increases by nearly 50 % the size of the Microsoft ' s 18-month-old Advanced Consumer Technology division , which is leading its efforts to help shape the information highway .
